Description As a forklift/reach truck driver at DHL Supply Chain, your tasks will include the following: You will be responsible for picking up and placing pallets in height (up to 12m) in the warehouse. You will work with a computer system that indicates when to place or pick up a pallet. You will also be responsible for unloading/loading trucks and/or containers. Single deep or double deep reaching with camera is a plus. You are willing to perform warehouse tasks (not 100% lift or reach truck…

Tu seras au cœur de l'action, entre les arrivages, les remplissa…
